channel.title: Javascript on Infinity Architect
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on Infinity Architect

item.title: DOM / Script Loading Order
item.description: <script defer> <script async> <script type="module"> are always executed asynchronously 1<!DOCTYPE html> 2<html lang="en"> 3 4<head> 5 <meta charset="UTF-8"> 6 <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> 7 <title>Checkbox Event Listener</title> 8</head> 9 10<body> 11 <script> 12 console.log(document.querySelector('#findme')); // null 13 </script> 14 15 <script type="module"> 16 console.log(document.querySelector('#findme')); // the <p> located 17 </script> 18 19 <p id="findme">Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Eos, earum harum, amet ut perspiciatis 20 voluptatibus voluptatem accusamus sed et consequatur beatae cumque repudiandae, id vero?
